tool_description: Logs and maintains a complete audit trail of all tracking events and status changes for return shipments.

event_type.description: Type of event (status_change, location_update, exception, delivery)

event_description.description: Detailed description of the tracking event

location.description: Geographic location associated with the event

carrier.description: Shipping carrier that reported the event

additional_data.description: Additional event data in JSON format

error_messages: Return ID not found: The specified return_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid event type: Use one of [status_change, location_update, exception, delivery].
Invalid timestamp format: event_timestamp must be in ISO 8601 date-time format.
Logging failed: Unable to log the tracking event due to database or system error.
Duplicate event: This exact event has already been logged for this return.
usage: Provide return_id, tracking_number, event_type, event_description, and event_timestamp, optionally include location, carrier, and additional_data.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for the logged event

logged_successfully.description: Whether the event was successfully logged

log_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the event was logged in the system

total_events.description: Total number of events logged for this return
